item.description:
The actual start time of the movie is 7, but we'll meet at Panera Bread across from the theater for a quick bite and head to the Coolidge by 6:30 to be sure we get good seats.

This is a live broadcast of the National Theatre's production of William Shakespeare's Hamlet starring Rory Kinnear and directed by Nicholas Hytner.

The basic story of Hamlet is generally well known, but here it is anyway: Hamlet, the prince of Denmark, sees his fatherâ€™s ghost. Tormented with loathing and consumed by grief, he must avenge his father's murder. What he cannot foresee is the destruction that ensues.

The live broadcasts at the Coolidge often sell out quickly, so it is strongly recommended you get your ticket well in advance. Tickets are $20 and available online at coolidge.org.

Hope to see you there!

Lisa
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be at the Panera Bread across the street from the Coolidge with a Meetup sign.
item.name: National Theatre Live - Hamlet
